reviews.review_msg: Awesome professor! I have never taken french and it is going absolutely fabulous. The professor is always there for you to practice your pronunciation or give additional feedback on any matter!

I think this course was going to be easy but it was really hard not due to the material covered but because we had to take too many tests, including oral tests and there was a lot of homework due every Sunday night. Each test was subdivided into three parts and there were five tests meaning 15 tests in total.

incredible prof! really caring and flexible, and was always available if you had any questions or if you needed any help with the material. you can tell she really wants you to succeed not just in this class but also in your studies. had really great lectures, was engaging and so sweet! merci beaucoup !

she is the best! I highly recommend you guys who are new to learn French taking her course. she is patient, respectful, careful and beautiful !! I've took her courses in 2 semesters. even though kinds lots of assignment , it's not tough. u won't lose too much scores in the tests. go for her!

She was great, however, people who have never done French before will likely struggle in this class. There was not enough emphasis on attempting to converse until the final oral examination. Also, she does everything once only so if you miss that, you're on your own. She's very helpful though and was very kind!
Nice prof, cared about you and answered questions. Frequently went over time.

Livia is simply amazing. She explains course content extremely well and answers questions clearly. Honestly, I look forward to going to class because of her! She's a very lovely prof (inside and out:)) and I wish there were more like her in universities. Definitely take her if you can. You go, Livia!

Such a nice and beautiful instructor, although her excellent teaching style is more attractive! Shes a great teacher with patience and respect to students from any level of French, which means everyone get fully encouraged and inspired. Tests, quizzes, and homework are just right, she provides lots of chances for us to practice and follow up.

I highly recommend her class. The way she teaches is easy to understand and she always try to make the class interesting. If you follow what she said in the lecture and review what you learn adequately, you can easily get A in this course. Even outside of the class, she can help you study a lot. I've never met such a wonderful teacher like her!
